text: Oh Eui-shik (born 1983) is a South Korean actor. He is known for roles in dramas such as Oh My Ghost, Love in the Moonlight and Hi Bye, Mama!. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title!! Role!!
